website_summaries.verdict: The Optoma GT1080 projector offers a short lag time, a bright image, 3D support for HDMI connections, and 1080p resolution to match the resolution of the newest crop of game systems.
cons: Shows posterization in its brightest mode

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Thing is awesome! Stuck it under the coffee table, set up in about a minute, made an image that filled the wall (about 200 inches diagonal) from a distance of about 1.5M. Picture crisp detailed, colours vivid. Got to be said, some veteran newscasters don’t benefit from HD images this size... Movies amazing. We connected it to Sky Q with a long hdmi lead and audio system through 3.5mm lead. Definitely best bang for your buck in the AV world in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Nash Nor

customer_reviews.title: Just ok - choose something else...
customer_reviews.text: Works ok - colour is washed out and the fan is very loud. Otherwise image is very clear and works ok --- would suggest you take a look at other options. Mine came with no instructions but i found them online and managed to setup ok.
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Great projector, very clear, not very noisy either. I like it :)
customer_reviews.text: This is my second optima projector and we use it in our living room. A great product, ideal for home use (as its a short throw projector) Really impressed with it. We use it as our main TV on a 100" screen. It works really well for me, but personally I dont think the HD side is as good as it could be, we dont use the sound as this goes through my amp. Its perfect for everything from YouTube to TV, to movies etc. Focus is good too. Very simple to use with a lot of options to get the picture perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: ... time and can honestly say this little beauty is awesome, the short throw on it is unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few projectors in my time and can honestly say this little beauty is awesome, the short throw on it is unbelievable, so far I don't have a bad word to say about it, will give this 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible distortion. Had 2 both the same!
customer_reviews.text: Straight lines in projected image are not straight. Bought an expensive fixed, tensioned projector screen but was still the same. Thought I had a defective unit so ordered a replacement but this is the same if not worse. It’s horrible for home screens like fire tv as everything looks wavey and distorted! When you bring up a volume bar etc at bottom of the screen it isn’t straight but curvy. Not happy at all for the £600 paid. Both units getting returned.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: happy customer here :)
customer_reviews.text: great projector. very bright and large picture from less than one metre. good set of options, just missing an USB power out for the amazon fire stick... apart from that, a fantastic purchase. really happy about it!
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The size of the screen that you can get with this projector is INCREDIBLE. Picture is sharp and the 3D is excellent. You need to buy the glasses separately. I plug in a BOSE speaker to give me great sound for a full home cinema experience, but the sound out of the unit itself is adequate but not great. As with all electronic devices, there is a hum from the cooling fan, but with my BOSE speakers turned up its hardly noticeable. Also love the fact its a portable, take anywhere system that I can use for work as well, or just change room to watch my movies!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Errrr, it's just a bit rubbish
customer_reviews.text: We needed a short-throw projector to work in a tight space and without doubt it does have a lovely wide projection at a close distance... other than that it is utterly rubbish and I question spending almost £600 (in 2020) for a projector which other than a short throw has limited features and exceptionally poor image quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Ward

customer_reviews.title: Common flicker problem- completely useless.
customer_reviews.text: Image flickers and flashes pure white every few seconds. Used for 7 hours total on economic mode. This appears to be a commonly reported fault. I will never buy Optoma again.
customer_reviews.author: Redditsayshi

customer_reviews.title: GT1080E - glad I got it
customer_reviews.text: Impressively quiet, with good enough speakers that I don't usually bother hooking it up to external speakers. Great picture quality without rainbow effects. I'm sure you can get better picture quality, but I'm not really sure why anyone would need it. It's very easy to set up and put away, so most of the time I leave it packed away and my living room looks nice and peaceful - it's great not having a big flat black TV screen in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great purchase, I can now have movie night in style, just like being at the cinema. The picture quality is great in both 2d and 3d, the sound is okay but I have mine going through my surround sound, this way the projector noise is not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Superb picture quality - makes a superb movie night
customer_reviews.text: Bought just before Christmas and what a wonderful addition to the family. Top notch. I needed a projector that can be setup in the living room and put away again, and I can get the Optoma and a 100" pull-up screen setup or put away quickly. I can get the Optoma setup with a 100" screen in less than 3 minutes - then let MOVIE NIGHT BEGIN!! Super reliable. Works really well with an AppleTV. So little tech, so much fun. 200% recommended. Wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Quality short throw projector
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture quality, easy to use straight out of the box. The fan is slightly noisy but no more than a PS4. The front pointing speakers bounce off the wall giving the impression of sound coming from the projected image. Sound quality is ok but for some reason very loud when paired with a firestick. Will be using the echo studio when it finally arrives though. The wall I'm using is a pale peach, but changing the colour tone adjusts for this and is fine by my standards.
customer_reviews.author: Tools of Light

customer_reviews.title: The lamp lasted 280 hours
customer_reviews.text: Its about 9 months passed with occasional use, the lamp died without notice. After the lamp change, I found out that ist been running only for 280 hours! This is not as advertised. Other than that, the projector is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ed48

customer_reviews.title: Broke 6 months in warranty useless
customer_reviews.text: Internal speaker stopped working 6 months after owning. 70hours of use. Manufacturer looked at it twice under warranty and stated there was nothing wrong with projector it wa all my devices that were faulty. I.e. DVD player, fireTV stick, now tv dongle. No chance they know there is something wrong with their product but engineers cant fix them. Never again am I purchasing from optoma. BEWARE!

customer_reviews.title: Optoma GT1080E (non-darbee)
customer_reviews.text: Pros Excellent picture from this projector. Very little rainbow effect. Cons Fan is no silent runner but not a big problem. Gets a lot warmer than previously owned projectors. Well worth the£440 paid out and colours are fantastic.

product_meta.title: Optoma GT1080E Full HD 1080p Short throw 3000 ANSI Lumens DLP Projector - White
product_meta.description:
Style Name:3.000 Lumens

Place your GT1080e on a coffee table and conveniently project a stunning 100 inch full HD 1080p image from just over a meter from a flat surface or screen. Bright and versatile this portable projector is ideal for gamers with its low input latency, live sports and home entertainment any time of day. It even comes with a carry bag so you can take it round to a friend's house for a sports event, movie night or games marathon to provide you with the best big screen experience anywhere with a flat surface. An integrated speaker provides you with great sound and two HDMI inputs enables an easy setup. Perfect for connecting a laptop, PC, Blu-ray player, media streamer or games console.



BOX CONTAINS
Projector, Carrying Case, Lens Cover, 2 x AAA Batteries, Wireless Remote Control
feature_bullets: Create a 100 inches with full HD 1080p image from just over a meter away
Easy connectivity - 2x HDMI and MHL support with built-in 10 W speaker
Operating conditions: 5-40 degree Celsius, max. humidity: 85 Percent, max altitude: 3000 m
Includes 2 year UK warranty on the projector and 1 year/1,000 hrs warranty on the light source
